text: Joseph Patrick Kennedy II (born September 24, 1952) is an American businessman and Democratic politician. He is a member of the Kennedy family. He is a son of former United States Senator Robert F. Kennedy and Ethel Kennedy. He is a nephew of former U.S. President John F. Kennedy and former U.S. Senator Ted Kennedy. Kennedy was a member of the United States House of Representatives from the 8th congressional district of Massachusetts from 1987 to 1999. His son, Joe Kennedy III, is a former congressman from Massachusetts. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Citizens Energy Corporation *Citizens Energy Corporation profile of Kennedy * Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:United States representatives from Massachusetts Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians Category:Politicians from Boston Category:Businesspeople from Boston Category:Kennedy family Category:Robert F. Kennedy
title: Joseph P. Kennedy II
